commentary.executive_summary: This report runs in HISTORICAL-ONLY mode: triangulation (RNS/social/trends) not loaded. The setup shows TOO_EARLY timing with 55/100 APEX score. Historical data shows 2 rallies averaging 18% upside. Current position: -8.5%. Your edge comes from waiting for AI Engine confirmation instead of blind entry.
bull_case: Early regime often offers best risk/reward
bear_case: TOO_EARLY means you can get chopped before real move
